content: At university, I studied hospitality psychology at the Faculty of International Studies and was conducting research on building strong teamwork in doing business. After graduating from university, I acquired basic knowledge of natural science and mathematical knowledge through the examination of Civil Aviation College. In addition, after joining EPKnoT Co., Ltd., while providing support work related to SLB project, I am also engaged in front-end, back-end, server-side work as an application engineer.
1996: Born in Tokyo and lived in Chiba.
work: Work in charge: Project Summary production, Project Management, Website / Application Development
